author: Barbara Shecter
title: ‘It will no doubt get worse’: Canadian unemployment rate may already top 10 per cent, as global jobless claims surge
description: 'We are headed for a period of unprecedented softness in economic activity'
content:
Canada’s unemployment rate may already have climbed to 10 per cent and economists predict it is headed even higher, driven by an “exodus of jobs” as global economies grind to a halt in an effort to slow the spread of the novel coronavirus.
Economists at Roya… [+3794 chars]
